nodes.text: Tireis Blackandwhite was a female who had the ability to divide herself into two separate entities called "segments." At some point in her life, Blackandwhite was married to Rzsco Snowwt, a famous actor. Following their divorce, Tireis Blackandwhite and Snowwt were both invited at a Vector Day party thrown by their mutual friend Mrp-Mrp Poo.
